PermissionStatus.summary: The PermissionStatus interface of the Permissions API provides the state of an object and an event handler for monitoring changes to said state.

PermissionStatusState.summary:
The state read-only property of the
interface returns the state of a requested permission.
This property returns one of 'granted', 'denied', or
'prompt'.

PermissionStatusChange.summary: The change event of the interface fires whenever the property changes.

PermissionStatusName.summary: The name read-only property of the interface returns the name of a requested permission.
PermissionStatusName.value: A read-only value that is identical to the name argument passed to .
